name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **Python**. Demonstrated expertise in building scalable applications utilizing **Redux**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and REST/GraphQL APIs, with a strong focus on performance optimization and adherence to best practices in CI/CD. Proficient in architecting secure, maintainable solutions that ensure compliance with industry standards. Hands-on experience with cloud services such as **AWS** (including **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3**) for deploying cloud-native applications, and databases like **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**. Solid skills in ensuring application security and optimizing performance using modern tools such as Lighthouse and Axe.

Further, I bring practical experience in integrating MLOps processes—from developing ML pipelines to managing workflows with tools like MLflow and Airflow. Committed to developing systems that drive real-world impact while fostering collaboration and innovation.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed intricate single-page applications leveraging **Redux** and **Hooks** for state management, enhancing user interaction and engagement across both web and API services.
• Spearheaded the integration of **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval and manipulation, optimizing query performance with real-time insights from **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**.
• Optimized deployment strategies through CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **AWS services** like **Lambda** and **S3**, ensuring streamlined integration and continuous delivery with minimal downtime.
• Developed and maintained responsive UIs with **HTML** and **CSS**, implementing best practices to enhance user experience and accessibility.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to produce high-performance RESTful services, utilizing **Node.js** and **Express`**, ensuring secure communication between front-end and back-end systems.
• Conducted performance audits and security scans using **Lighthouse** and **Axe** to ensure applications met industry standards and provided a smooth user experience.
• Analyzed user feedback and application performance to inform feature improvements and iterations, effectively reducing load times by **30%**.
• Implemented robust backend solutions in **Python** for data processing tasks and integrated with **Firebase** for real-time database functionalities, enhancing overall application responsiveness.
• Launched new features guided by user-centered design principles and data-driven insights, successfully increasing user engagement by **25%** over **6 months**.

Utilized **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux Toolkit** to build dynamic, user-focused front-end applications, enhancing performance and user experience for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Employed **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to modernize financial platforms with a microservices-based architecture, resulting in a **30% increase** in scalability and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
Optimized application performance and security by implementing best practices in **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Developed real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating tracking of financial activities and enabling operations teams to generate actionable insights, thus improving detection times by **25%**.
Integrated messaging systems like **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to support asynchronous communication and real-time event processing, which enhanced alert delivery efficiency by **40%**.
Designed and orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, leading to efficient batch and real-time data ingestion from both internal and external sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection algorithms using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, proactively identifying suspicious activities and improving fraud detection effectiveness by **20%**.
Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring models are integrated into backend services for real-time decision-making, reducing processing latency by **15%**.

Developed and optimized high-performance web applications as a **Senior Fullstack Engineer** utilizing **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux** to create responsive user interfaces, achieving a **20%** increase in user engagement.
Engineered backend services with **Node.js (Express)** and **Python** to deliver robust RESTful APIs, maintaining a system uptime of **99.9%** across all services.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for efficient data management and storage solutions, ensuring high-speed access with optimized queries that reduced data retrieval time by **30%**.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines to automate build and deployment processes, reducing the time to market for new features by **25%** while adhering to best practices and performance optimization strategies.
Applied secure coding practices and integrated **AWS** services such as **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3** for hosting and storage, achieving compliance with security standards to protect sensitive user information.
Conducted application performance audits using **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, enhancing site loading speed to under **2 seconds** and ensuring accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1.
Utilized **Firebase** for real-time data synchronization, enabling an interactive experience for users without compromising performance.
Created dynamic and REST-compliant APIs as well as **GraphQL** implementations to streamline client-server communication for optimal data fetching.
Participated in peer code reviews and established best practices among the development team to foster a culture of quality and effectiveness in software delivery.
